Common objectives cf ''[[To know the elements of systematic questioning and clinical examination of a child according to age and context 2C-047-PC-A01|To know the elements of systematic questioning and clinical examination of a child according to age and context]]'''

Specific objectives

*https://www.formulaires.service-public.fr/gf/cerfa_12596.do 8<sup>th</sup> day]: history, pregnancy, delivery, condition at birth, pathologies in the first week, congenital anomalies, breastfeeding, vaccinations (BCG or HBV), newborn hearing screening,
*https://www.formulaires.service-public.fr/gf/cerfa_12597.do 9<sup>th</sup> month]: history, vaccinations, eye and hearing tests, psychomotor development, measurements, breastfeeding, risk of lead poisoning, current medical conditions.
*https://www.formulaires.service-public.fr/gf/cerfa_12598.do 24<sup>ème</sup> mois]: idem 9th month + dental condition

question.title: What is the content of the medical certificates accompanying the compulsory systematic monitoring of infants?

option_a.title: History, pregnancy, delivery, condition at birth, pathologies in the first week, congenital anomalies, breastfeeding, vaccinations (BCG or HBV), and newborn hearing screening
option_a.description: A list of medical conditions and vaccinations administered to infants

option_b.title: History, vaccinations, eye and hearing tests, psychomotor development, measurements, breastfeeding, risk of lead poisoning, and current medical conditions
option_b.description: A list of medical tests and assessments performed on infants

option_c.title: A list of vaccinations and medical conditions administered to infants at 8th day, 9th month, and 24th month
option_c.description: A list of vaccinations and medical conditions administered to infants at specific ages

option_d.title: A list of medical conditions and vaccinations administered to infants at 8th day, 9th month, and 24th month
option_d.description: A list of medical conditions and vaccinations administered to infants at specific ages
